summary: Despite being nearly proven the murderer, a serial killer threatens to kill the daughter of a forensic pathologist if he doesn't get him bailed out.
cast: Kyung-gu Sol|Seung-bum Ryoo|Hye-jin Han|Ji-ru Sung|Nam Kyung-Eub|Jeong-heon Lee|Jeong-hak Park|Park Sang-wook|Kim Yeol
title: Yongseoneun eupda
